code:
gantt
  title VaultMesh Identity Roadmap (Infra_EtcdCluster)
  dateFormat  YYYY-MM-DD
  axisFormat  %b %d

  section Security
  Baseline Conditional Access      :done,   sec1, 2025-11-15, 2026-01-15
  Sign-in Logs → Azure Monitor     :active, sec2, 2025-11-15, 2026-02-15

  section Reliability
  Remote TF State + Locking        :rel1,   2025-11-20, 2025-12-10
  Break-glass Runbook              :rel2,   2025-12-10, 2026-01-15

  section Validation
  Graph API + SCIM smoke tests     :val1,   2025-11-25, 2026-01-10
  Drift detection (Infra_WorkerNode)  :val2,   2025-12-05, 2025-12-20

  section Visibility
  Plan/Merkle → Slack/Teams        :vis1,   2025-12-05, 2026-01-05
  Observability dashboards         :vis2,   2026-01-05, 2026-03-15

  section Federation
  Multi-tenant modules + orgs.yaml :fed1,   2026-03-01, 2026-06-01
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们来设计一下这个流程，首先需要一个开始节点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 明白了，Generic Diagram就这样设计。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 确认一下，Generic Diagram是正确的吧？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 最终，我们在Generic Diagram完成整个流程。
